pages.title: about
pages.text: A senior undergraduate student fascinated by and dedicated to computer graphics. Interests computer graphics, simulation and physics-based animation, shape reconstrution, physics-based rendering Experiences Research Project: Precise Calibration and Modeling of Piezo-resistive Textile 2020.3-2021.9 Advisor: Prof. Jingyuan Cheng, School of Computer Science and Technology, USTC ◦ Realized a mathematical model to predict the nonlinear behavior of piezoresistive textile ◦ Built a finite-element physical model of the textile Education Bachelor of Engineering in Electronic Science and Technology at University of Science and Technology of China, 2018-2022 Skills ◦ Python (4000 lines, including Taichi) ◦ C++ (3000 lines, including OpenGL) ◦ C# (1200 lines, for Unity) ◦ MATLAB (500 lines) ◦ COMSOL (finite-element simulation, on Structural Mechanics and Electromagnetics) ◦ Cinema 4D (created animations for fun) Useful Links GAMES (Graphics And Mixed Environment Seminar) Siggraph paper collection Contact e-mail: shayito_@outlook.com
